name: Blood Weapon
help:
Reduces weaponskill cast time and recast time, spell cast time and recast time, and auto-attack delay by 10% and converts physical damage dealt into MP, while reducing weaponskill TP cost by 20%. Also increases Blood Gauge by 3 each time a physical attack lands. Duration: 15s
Cannot be used while under the effect of Grit. Effect is canceled if Grit is activated.
